item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Hello world!

This is my very first blog written in markdown format and rendered through Hugo.

Upcoming post plan

  • Summary of AML and ATF knowledge recently learned
  • Examining large language model and deploy easy-to-use ones for NLP research and applications (mainly open-source models)
  • Overview of large language model’s performance in various tasks:
    • Named entity resolution
    • Baselines or extensions of earlier research work (Chatbot for Portfolio Management, and Class Imbalanced Slot Filling)
  • Other items (Google Cloud Platform applications, Applied ML research etc.)
